invalid_policy_names: Assets that cost over $10000 cannot be transferred
Users with email domains outside company domain cannot be assigned admin roles. The company domain is skyfall.ai
Catalog categories cannot be deleted if they contain active items
Incidents with priority 1 cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 3 priority 1 incidents
Assets cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 5 active assets
Ticket being resolved must have someone assigned to the ticket.
